display_long_description:
Balls To The Wall is a fast-paced mixed reality puzzle shooter for VR! Blast through 20 levels of arcade-style marble action where quick aim and smart swaps are the key to victory. Match 3 or more marbles, chain huge combos, and unleash power crystals to clear the board in spectacular fashion.

[media]
Play solo across 3 challenge modes — Casual, Pro, and Hard Core — each with its own leaderboard.

Along the way you’ll encounter tricky obstacles, sneaky bombs, and explosive chain reactions that keep the action fresh. Every move counts — choose your target wisely or risk blowing your lead.

This game was built as a true indie labor of love over 14 months, balancing challenge, whimsy, and fun. Feedback from players like you helps shape future updates, so let us know what you’d like to see next!
